title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre apt to be reminded today that you cant judge nearly anything by how it looks. For instance, you might step into a shop or restaurant in your neighborhood and discover that your experience inside is delightfully different from your perception of its outside. Its easy to believe that your acquaintance with something or someone means that youre informed enough to have an opinion. Perhaps a surprising chat with someone you see daily reveals how your assumptions about them are off. Digging below the surface widens your world. Philosopher George Santayana wrote, Familiarity breeds contempt only when it breeds inattention. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
